text: What are you doing? Take your hand away~~
Mouse... mouse is in the wrong place!
What do you want to do?
Meow meow meow?
Scared! (ノ≧∇≦)ノ
Harassment! Help!
In that case, I'll have to use force!
I'm getting angry now.
Don't touch me!
Truly... truly shameless!
Hentai!
Guess what I'm going to say?
I heard a lot of life lessons from the Frog Prince.
Wanna play a shooting game?
This button says 'Do not click'.
Do you want to play a game with me?
I heard this can make you dance!
Don't you love me anymore? Sob sob~
Do you want to see my sister?
Want to meet my little sister?
Switching waifu models?
Do you like cosplay PLAY?
What should we dress up as this time?
Costume change!
Let's see what happens next!
You want to take a photo? 1, 2, 3—Cheese!
How about we take a selfie?
Just keep smiling~
Want to know more about me?
Here is my moving history.
What would you like to know about me?
Is it time to say goodbye?
Sob QAQ... until we meet again...
Don't abandon me...
Will we meet again?
Hmph! You'll regret this!
Was that an accident?
What's a lolicon?
Have you seen my teddy bear?
Touch me again and I'll call the police! ⌇●﹏●⌇
Hello, police? Someone is harassing me (ó﹏ò｡)
Stop touching me, or I'll tell your wife!
What are you doing? I'll bite you!
Stop touching me, there's nothing interesting here!
What do you want to comment?
Make sure to write something meaningful~
Got something to say?
Enter the captcha to submit the comment~

seasons.text: It's Valentine's Day again! Found your partner in {year}?
It's Labor Day, got any holiday plans?
It's National Day, celebrate for the country!
It's Christmas, I bet you’re shopping again!

time.text: Good morning! A new day is starting!
Good morning! How's work? Don't sit too long, move around a bit!
Evening! The sunset looks beautiful, doesn't it?

text: It's so late! Go to bed early, good night~
Take care of your eyes during late hours!

time.text: Are you a night owl? It's so late, can you wake up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, time flies so fast...
You haven't talked to me in so long, sob sob~
I'll hit your chest with my tiny fists!
Don't forget to bookmark this site!
message.console: Haha, you opened the console! Trying to see my secrets?
message.copy: What did you copy? Don't forget to credit the source!
